ee dawas wala ape gam wala pawa danata wada gami gathiyak thibuna.gama athule eetharam mudal passe hambaa yamak thibune nathi hindada manda awurudda kalinma enne gamata.ada wena kota kohek ka gahana sadde ahenne kalathurakin.mama game aapu dawas tikata mata thama ehema hadak ahune na.erabadu mal pipena koha ka gahana aluth awurudda thiyenne tiwi eke witharayi.mama podi kale aluth awurudu kaledi wadiyen aasa karapu de thama nada gewal wala yana eka.bas eke kattiyama ekka awurudu aran nandala mamala balanna yanne puduma aasawakin.habayi ithin ada bas ekaka gamanak yanawa kiyanne epa wena sin ekak.oya asse thawath aasa karapu deyak thama aluth awuruddata aluth andum ganna eka.awuruddata kalin nagareta gihilla aluth andunuyi rathinynyayi aragena enne puduma sathutakin.ayi ithin dan wage ee kaledi apata yahamin andum thibbe na nowa.mata mathakayi mama podi dawas wala una wedillak pawa hadala paththu karala thiyenawa.ada inna lamayekta nam una wedillak kiwwoth pudumayen wage ee mokadda kiyala ahanawa shuwar.ada kollek una wedillak hadala paththu karanna giyoth ithin kama hambawenawa shuwar.ayi ithin ooka oya tharam bhayanakayi kiyanawane.habayi api podi kale api ammala ta horen hari oowa hadala baluwa.aluth awuruddata kussiyata aluthen goma mati gagannawa kiyala sirasen pennuwata ada goma gapu kussiyak koheda thiyenne.habayi ithin api nam oya gana goma anga pura gagena ammalagen guti kala thiyena wara ananthayi.

mehidi upathin senasuru ihatha sa`dahan karana lada uchicha ho swa keshatha්ra ho mithuru rashiyakadayi wimasiya yuthuya,esema thamage lagnayata ho sa`du sitina rashiyata anuwa yahapath ga්rahayek dayi wimasiya yuthuya.mehidi mbaabage lagnaya thula nami senasuru yogakaraka ga්rahayek wana athara mbaabage sa`du sitina rashiya kumibha nami kumibha senasuruta ayath rashiyak wana bawa awabodha wanu atha.me aakarayata senasuru mbaabage janma patha්raye sitiyi nami eyada senasuruge janma patha්raya thula sitina yahapath ha balawath pihitimak yanuyen hadiniwiya hakiya.esema senasuru thamata himi kumibha ,makara ha uchichawana thula rashiye weminma janma patha්rayaka 1 - 4 - 7 - 10 yana sthanayaka sitima shasha nami maha pursha yogayaka udawa wana athara eyada janmiya kerehi senasuruge shubha pa්rathipala himiwana bawata niewidanayak wana bawada datha yuthuya.nawanshakaya thulada senasuru ihatha sa`dahan karana lada mitha්ra ,sawa keshatha්ra ho uchicha rashiyaka upathin sitimada yahapath pihitimaki.
